member.name: IQueryCodePage.GetCodePage
member.summary: Retrieves the numeric value (Code Page identifier) of the ANSI code page.
member.param: The numeric value (Code Page identifier) of the ANSI code page.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IQueryCodePage.SetCodePage
member.summary: Sets the numeric value of the ANSI code page to a specified code page identifier.
member.param: The numeric value of the ANSI code page you want to set.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IQueryCodePage
member.summary: Gets and sets the numeric value (Code Page identifier) of the ANSI code page.
